doc:
Derek Griffiths https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Derek_Griffiths 0 Derek Griffiths (born 15 July 1946) is a British actor who appeared in numerous British children's television series in the 1960s to present and has more recently played parts in TV drama. Derek_Griffiths ( born 15_July_1946 ) is a_British_actor who appeared in numerous_British_children 's_television_series in the_1960s to present and has_more_recently_played parts in TV_drama .
